code: import React,{useState}from'react';import SubNav from'../../components/common/layout/SubNav';import CompanySetupDashboard from'./components/CompanySetupDashboard';import CompanyDetails from'./components/details/CompanyDetails';import FoundationDocuments from'./components/foundation/FoundationDocuments';import FinancialSetup from'./components/financial/FinancialSetup';import LegalCompliance from'./components/legal/LegalCompliance';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CompanySetup=()=>{const[activeSubTab,setActiveSubTab]=useState('dashboard');const subTabs=[{id:'dashboard',name:'Dashboard'},{id:'details',name:'Company Details'},{id:'foundation',name:'Foundation Documents'},{id:'financial',name:'Financial Setup'},{id:'legal',name:'Legal & Compliance'}];const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeSubTab){case'dashboard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CompanySetupDashboard,{});case'details':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CompanyDetails,{});case'foundation':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FoundationDocuments,{});case'financial':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FinancialSetup,{});case'legal':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LegalCompliance,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CompanySetupDashboard,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Company Setup"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SubNav,{subTabs:subTabs,activeSubTab:activeSubTab,onSubTabChange:setActiveSubTab}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-8",children:renderContent()})]});};export default CompanySetup;
